long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is used to sign documents digitally inside the Certisign platform (www.portaldeassinaturas.com.br). You will need to have a digital certificate in order to sign your documents, if you do not have one, please visit our website www.certisign.com.br and check which certificate fit your needs better.
